summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, inquiring about the current employment status of Carolyn Robin, who previously worked for Highbridge. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a disclaimer regarding its privileged nature.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, seeking information about Carolyn Robin's current employment.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, tasked with finding out where Carolyn Robin currently works.

persons.name: Carolyn Robin
persons.context: Carolyn Robin is mentioned as a former employee of Highbridge, whose current employment status Epstein is inquiring about.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley for assistance in finding information about Carolyn Robin.
Robin previously worked for Epstein at Highbridge.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is seeking information about Carolyn Robin's current employment.
Carolyn Robin is noted to have previously worked for Highbridge.
The email contains a confidentiality disclaimer indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
Jes Staley is the recipient of the email and is asked to assist in the inquiry.
